title: No, Biden Didn’t Wear a ‘Wire’ or ‘Smart’ Contact Lenses During 1st Debate
subtitle: Conspiracy theories about high-tech devices rocketed across social media after the first presidential debate of 2020.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Democratic 2020 presidential candidate Joe Biden wore a "wire" and high-tech contact lenses that allowed him to receive talking points from an unseen third party during the first presidential debate.
